job.title: Machine Learning/Data Engineer-REMOTE
job.description: <strong>This AI Computer Software company located in Palo Alto, CA is looking to hire a sharp Machine Learning/Data Engineer to join their growing company<br><br></strong>This Jobot Job is hosted by Taylor Buckelew<br><br>Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.<br><br>Salary $135,000 - $170,000 per year<br><br><strong>A Bit About Us<br><br></strong>Located in the beautiful Palo Alto, CA we are the leading provider of AI- powered software products that transform healthcare claims and payment operations. Our platform has enabled us to develop and deploy, at high speed, industry-specific products.<br><br>We are looking to hire a strong Machine Learning/Data Engineer to own out data ingestion and transformation process. You will ultimately own the data and make them available within the Data Science organization as well.<br><br><strong><br><br><strong>Why join us?<br><br><br></strong></strong>We offer a comprehensive compensation package including but not limited to<br><ul><li> A competitive base salary ranging from $135K-$165K (DOE) + EQUITY! </li><li>401k</li><li>Benefits Health, Dental, Vision</li><li>Collaborative team</li><li>Trainings</li><li>Paid time off</li><li>Parties and team building events<br></li></ul><strong>Job Details<br><br></strong>You will be responsible for and MUST have most or ALL of the following<br><ul><li>Hands-on experience with Machine Learning Data Engineering in either a lead developer or a management role</li><li>SQL proficiency is a MUST</li><li>Experience managing the delivery of complex data</li><li>Experience with cloud-based services and enterprise software environments</li><li>Strong data technical background</li><li>Familiarity with frameworks and protocols for data transfer, data consumption and data manipulation</li><li>Ability to balance trade offs among multiple competing priorities</li><li>Experience with Machine Learning pipelines, Big Data</li><li>PLUS, not required if candidate has worked with medical records before<br></li></ul>IF INTERESTED, APPLY DIRECTLY HERE OR EMAIL ME A RESUME AT taylor.buckelew@jobot.com<br><br>Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.<br><br>
